Title: Advanced WebParts
Description: Project to create web parts for SharePoint with AJAX and/or Silverlight functionality.
HomeWiki:
Advanced WebParts

Project to create web parts for SharePoint with AJAX and/or Silverlight functionality. Currently in beta but we are close to first production quality release.

Update!

There is a bug in current 0.9.5 release, that causes AccordionNavi and Page Rating not loading correctly. We are working on this issue and try to release new version as soon as possible. The bug is related to AjaxControlToolkit.dll, which is not properly included in our installation package. We apologize for the inconvenience.

New version 0.9.5 released

New Video Playlist web part.

AccordionNaviWebPart
Replaces standard QuickLaunch navigation with accordion from AJAX Toolkit.

RatingWebPart
Rate pages with 1 to 5 stars. Also you can give optional feedback.

SlideshowWebPart
Displays images from Picture Library in Silverlight Slideshow.

TickerWebPart
Displays content from list in up-down scrolling javascript ticker.

VideoPlayerWebPart
Display Silverlight streaming video from document library.

VideoPlaylistWebPart
Display playlist with video files from document library.
